General.Name: Good Way Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Good Way Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells USB peripherals worldwide. The company offers docking stations; thunderbolt devices; USB video, display port, digital video, and USB Ethernet adapters; USB peripherals; wireless presenters; share switches; and USB hubs, data transfer products, and audio devices. It also provides active motion sensors, home gateway products, USB dongles, door/window sensors, power monitor switches, LED dimmers, and panic buttons; power switches, IP cams, and sirens; and sales and technical support services. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 135, Baociao Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 231
